author: charles
msg: Updated avalon libs to approx 1000GMT 27Nov, especially Runnable vs Stoppable

author: serge
msg: Various optimizations, primarily introducing 1) JamesMimeMessage, which does not load/parse the MimeMessage until a method is called on the object, and 2) JamesMimeMessageInputStream (extended for specific mail repositories) which do not open connections to their underlying resource until a read() is called.

author: charles
msg: Bug fix for loose input streams/ file handles
